scripts.build: yarn prep:rinkeby && graph codegen && graph build
scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn prep:mainnet && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs bulla-network/bulla-contracts-mainnet
scripts.deploy:rinkeby: yarn prep:rinkeby && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs bulla-network/bulla-contracts-rinkby

scripts.deploy:celo: yarn prep:celo && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs bulla-network/bulla-contracts-celo
scripts.deploy:aurora: yarn prep:aurora && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs bulla-network/bulla-contracts-aurora

scripts.deploy:arbitrum: yarn prep:arbitrum && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs bulla-network/bulla-contracts-arbitrum
